about_the_game:
No More Deep is a first-person shooter and puzzle-solving survival horror game that tells a bizarre yet captivating story.

Wenster Town was once a flourishing settlement renowned far and wide, but after a meteorite incident, it faded into oblivion. When the protagonist, Jack, returns to the town that raised him, he discovers everything has changed. He meets a beautiful woman named Asalia, who claims to be the “goddess” of the town—yet she seems deeply intertwined with the town’s mysteries. What force turned this prosperous hometown into a desolate ruin? What secrets lie behind Aishaliya? And what hidden truths lurk behind the downfall of Wenster Town? Players will guide Jack through the abandoned streets and the hidden world within, facing horrifying creatures and mysterious powers to unveil the secrets buried for so many years.

Key Features:

  • An immersive bodycam system that delivers an exceptionally realistic horror experience

  • A distinctively designed Victorian Gothic town created with Unreal Engine 5

  • The latest UE5 MetaHuman technology, bringing the protagonist to life with realistic facial expressions and animations

  • Intense, adrenaline-pumping combat against a variety of monsters and formidable bosses

  • Comprehensive clue-inspection, item-inspection, and assembly systems, plus robust resource gathering and allocation mechanics

  • An immersive dialogue system offering an RPG-like experience, where different choices lead to various quest outcomes

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a first-person shooting game. Players need to shoot the monsters and evil spirits that appear in the game. There will be bloody scenes of shooting. And some of the NPC in the game have an appearance that exposes flesh and blood.
